text: @realDonaldTrump We know you are a pathetic & selfish POS whom the Elect Coll grave a win in 2016. However, high unemployment, 112+K deaths & spike in cases from #COVID19, the protests & police violence, shouldn't a president have better things to do than tweet BS all day? #TrumpIsALaughingStock
